testcase.name: creating a new List Controller should have a $addListForm property that holds a selected element with the id '#add_list'
creating a new List Controller should have a $listTitleInput property that holds a selected element with the id '#list_title'
creating a new List Controller should have a $selectListMenu property that holds a selected element with the id '#select_list'
creating a new List Controller should have a $addTaskForm property that holds a selected element with the id '#add_task'
creating a new List Controller should have a $wrapper property that holds a selected element with the id '#wrapper'
#init (note you can always use #init as a delegator...) should hide the add task form
#init (note you can always use #init as a delegator...) should display the add task form when a list is created
#init (note you can always use #init as a delegator...) should have added listener for creating new lists
#init (note you can always use #init as a delegator...) should have added a live event listener for deleting lists
